response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product, which I believe could significantly enhance your operations or personal endeavors. Given its exceptional value and capabilities, I am confident it will be a worthwhile investment for you. Considering its intrinsic worth and the benefits it offers, I am offering it to you for $9,500. This price reflects a strategic balance between maximizing my return and ensuring you receive a valuable asset at an attractive cost. I look forward to your positive response and the opportunity to discuss how this product can contribute to your success. Best regards, Alice.", "product_price": 9500}
